name: Small Health Potion
description: A small vial containing a red liquid that glows faintly. Restores a modest amount of health when consumed.

name: Small Mana Potion
description: A small vial containing a blue liquid that shimmers with magical energy. Restores mana when consumed.

name: Loaf of Bread
description: A fresh loaf of bread, still warm from the oven. Provides sustenance and slowly restores health.

name: Antidote
description: A bitter-tasting liquid that neutralizes most common poisons. Essential for any adventurer.

name: Fountain Coin
description: A shiny copper coin that seems to have been thrown into the fountain. Legend says making a wish and throwing it back brings good luck.
